org.jaudiolibs.audioservers
Class AudioConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.jaudiolibs.audioservers.AudioConfiguration

public class AudioConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Provides details of the configuration of the server from which an AudioClient will be called.

Method Detail

isFixedBufferSize

public boolean isFixedBufferSize()
Is the buffer size fixed. If variable, the buffer size will always be between 1 and getMaxBufferSize().

Returns:
true if fixed, otherwise variable.

getInputChannelCount

public int getInputChannelCount()
Get the number of input channels.

Returns:
int ( >=0 )

getMaxBufferSize

public int getMaxBufferSize()
Get the maximum buffer size. This is the buffer size in samples per channel.

Returns:
int ( >=1 )
